definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
(idiom) to be unable to return to one's hometown due to the shame of failure (originally referred to Xiang Yu 項羽|项羽[Xiang4 Yu3], who chose not to retreat to Jiangdong after his humiliating defeat)
pinyin: wu2 yan2 jian4 Jiang1 dong1 fu4 lao3

sentences.english: The junior and senior of the senate all have driver's licenses.
sentences.chinese: 商讨院的年父老以及幼年者都有驾驶执照。

sentences.english: Welcome to the real world, folks.
sentences.chinese: 乡亲父老，欢迎来到现实世界。

sentences.english: All products are purchased from acquaintance fellow villagers so that products have high quality.
sentences.chinese: 所有产品收购于邻近相识的父老乡亲，品质有保障。

sentences.english: The organization had many obligations among which cooperation and mutual help were its aims.
sentences.chinese: 里父老的职责繁多，协作互助是父老僤的宗旨。

sentences.english: The organization had many obligations among which cooperation and mutual help were its aims.
sentences.chinese: 里父老的职责繁多，协作互助是父老僤的宗旨。

sentences.english: Hereby he is presenting the fellows in Northeast China.
sentences.chinese: 在这里他向我们呈现的是东北的父老乡亲。

sentences.english: Not all the twenty-five members in the organization were the Elders.
sentences.chinese: 僤中的二十五人并非都是里父老。

sentences.english: The rude forefathers of the hamlet sleep.
sentences.chinese: 小村里粗鄙的父老在那里安睡。

sentences.english: the junior and senior of the senate all have driver's licenses.
sentences.chinese: 商讨院的年父老和幼年者都有驾驶执照。

sentences.english: Thanks to those guys who have ever supported me and my family. Thanks indeed.
sentences.chinese: 谢谢各位父老乡亲对我的关心和支持。

sentences.english: Wherever you go , don't forget the local people.
sentences.chinese: 无论走到哪里，不要忘记家乡父老。

sentences.english: But he wanted to see the old folk again and to visit my mother's grave.
sentences.chinese: 但是，他想看一看家乡父老乡亲，为我的母亲扫墓。

sentences.english: Loosing only to China is something they can proudly tell their friends back home…
sentences.chinese: 仅负于中国的骄人战绩也足可以告慰家乡父老了。

sentences.english: Home so that elders with low-cost consumer will be able to experience the world of paint color of the wind.
sentences.chinese: 让家乡父老用廉价的消费就能领略到世界名漆的风彩。

definition: fellow countryman (from the same village)/local people/villager/the folks back home
villager/(Tw) (Internet slang) person who likes to follow online discussions and add their opinions
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
